news.title: We've Only Just Begun Festival announces day-by-day breakdown and stage times
news.summary: The three-night festival is back at Whelan's this August

news.title: Robert Plant announces new album Saving Grace
news.summary: The record comes out on September 26 via Nonesuch Records.

news.title: JoJo Siwa to open European tour in Dublin this September
news.summary: The tour will hit Dublin, Glasgow, Manchester, Newcastle, London, Brighton, Birmingham, Cardiff, Paris, Cologne and Warsaw.

news.title: Michael D. Higgins to release spoken-word album Against All Certainty
news.summary: The record comes out on September 5 via Claddagh Records.

news.title: In the new issue: Oasis star on the cover of Hot Press ahead of their Live '25 Croke Park shows
news.summary: This special new issue of Hot Press is available to pre-order now. It features an Oasis deep-dive, Loyle Carner, 49th & Main, Dave Lofts, AZIYA and much more.

news.title: 10 years ago today: Tame Impala released Currents
news.summary: To celebrate the 10th anniversary of Currents, we're revisiting our original album review...
